      • getOAuthConsumerSecret

        public String getOAuthConsumerSecret(String consumerKey)
                              throws IdentityOAuthAdminException
        Returns the consumer secret corresponding to a given consumer key
        Parameters:
        consumerKey - Consumer key
        Returns:
        consumer secret
        Throws:
        IdentityOAuthAdminException - Error when reading consumer secret from the persistence store

      • isConsumerSecretExist

        public boolean isConsumerSecretExist(String consumerKey,
                                     String consumerSecret)
                              throws IdentityOAuthAdminException
        Check whether the provided consumerKey, consumerSecret combination is exist or not in the database.
        Parameters:
        consumerKey - Consumer key.
        consumerSecret - Consumer secret.
        Returns:
        Check the provided consumerKey, consumerSecret combination is exist or not.
        Throws:
        IdentityOAuthAdminException - Error when reading consumer key, consumer secret from the database.

      • getAuthenticatedUsername

        public String getAuthenticatedUsername(String clientId,
                                       String clientSecret)
                                throws IdentityOAuthAdminException
        Returns the username corresponding to a given client id and consumer secret
        Parameters:
        clientId - Client Id/Key
        clientSecret - Consumer secret
        Returns:
        Username if successful, empty string otherwise
        Throws:
        IdentityOAuthAdminException - Error when reading consumer secret from the persistence store

      • getOAuthTokenSecret

        public String getOAuthTokenSecret(String token,
                                  Boolean isAccessToken)
                           throws org.wso2.carbon.identity.base.IdentityException
        Get the token secret for the given access token
        Parameters:
        token - OAuth token, this could be a request token(temporary token) or a access token
        isAccessToken - True, if it is as access token
        Returns:
        Token Secret
        Throws:
        IdentityOAuthAdminException - Error when accessing the token secret from the persistence store.
        org.wso2.carbon.identity.base.IdentityException

      • createOAuthRequestToken

        public void createOAuthRequestToken(String consumerKey,
                                    String oauthToken,
                                    String oauthSecret,
                                    String userCallback,
                                    String scope)
                             throws IdentityOAuthAdminException
        Creates a new OAuth token.
        Parameters:
        consumerKey - Consumer Key
        oauthToken - OAuth Token, a unique identifier
        oauthSecret - OAuth Secret
        userCallback - Where the user should be redirected once the approval completed.
        scope - Resource or the scope of the resource.
        Throws:
        IdentityOAuthAdminException - Error when writing the OAuth Req. token to the persistence store

      • authorizeOAuthToken

        public Parameters authorizeOAuthToken(String oauthToken,
                                      String userName,
                                      String oauthVerifier)
                               throws org.wso2.carbon.identity.base.IdentityException
        Authorizes the OAuth request token.
        Parameters:
        oauthToken - Authorized OAuth token
        userName - The name of the user who authorized the token.
        oauthVerifier - oauth_verifier - an unique identifier
        Throws:
        org.wso2.carbon.identity.base.IdentityException

                             String accessToken,

      • validateAccessToken

        public String validateAccessToken(String consumerKey,
                                  String oauthToken,
                                  String reqScope)
                           throws org.wso2.carbon.identity.base.IdentityException
        Validating the access token. Should be equal in the scope where the original request token been issued to.If this matches, the method returns the user who authorized the request token.
        Parameters:
        consumerKey - Consumer Key
        oauthToken - Access Token
        reqScope - Scope in the request
        Returns:
        Authorized Username
        Throws:
        org.wso2.carbon.identity.base.IdentityException - Error when reading token information from persistence store or invalid token or invalid scope.
